users.title: Users
users.description: View, edit, and manage user accounts and permissions
users.name: Name
users.fallbackWarning: Could not retrieve full user details. Displaying basic information. Ensure 'get_all_users_for_admin' RPC is correctly configured and accessible.
users.noProjectsFound: No projects found for this user.
users.noActivityFound: No activity logs found for this user.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: View and manage all projects in the system
projects.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, description, or location
projects.name: Name
projects.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete '{{projectName}}'? This will mark the project as deleted but keep it in the system for recovery.
projects.permanentDeleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete '{{projectName}}' and all associated data from the system.
projects.confirm_permanent_delete_body: This action cannot be undone. All project data, including materials, labor, equipment, and additional costs, will be permanently removed. Are you absolutely sure?

dropdowns.title: Project Data Settings
dropdowns.description: Manage dropdown options used in Projects
dropdowns.confirmChangeMessage: Are you sure you want to change this value?
dropdowns.currencyChangeWarningMessage: The currency code for {{oldValue}} is being changed to {{newValue}}. This will also update its entry in the exchange rates table and may affect existing projects that use this currency. Are you sure you want to proceed?
dropdowns.projectTypesDescription: Types of construction projects (e.g., Residential, Commercial, Industrial)
dropdowns.projectSizeUnitsDescription: Units for measuring project size (e.g., sqm, sqft, units)
dropdowns.materialUnitsDescription: Units for materials (e.g., kg, mÂ³, ton, each)
dropdowns.equipmentPeriodUnitsDescription: Time units for equipment rental (e.g., Day, Week, Month)
dropdowns.equipmentRentalPurchaseDescription: Options for equipment acquisition (e.g., Rental, Purchase)
dropdowns.additionalCostCategoriesDescription: Categories for additional project costs (e.g., Permits, Fees, Contingency)
dropdowns.riskProbabilitiesDescription: Probability levels for risk assessment (e.g., Low, Medium, High)
dropdowns.currenciesDescription: Currency options for projects (e.g., USD, EUR, YER)
dropdowns.deleteOptionBody: Are you sure you want to delete this option? This action cannot be undone.
dropdowns.invalidRate: Invalid exchange rate. Please enter a valid number.
dropdowns.rateUpdateWarning: Changing the currency code for {{currency}} will also update its entry in the exchange rates table. Please ensure the rate is correct.
dropdowns.durationUnitDescription: Time units for project duration (e.g., Day, Week, Month)

appSettings.title: App Settings
appSettings.description: Configure the general app settings and preferences
appSettings.allowSignupsDesc: Enable or disable new user signups for the app.
appSettings.allowUserSignupsDescription: Enable or disable new user registrations for the application.
appSettings.signupEnabled: New user registration is currently enabled.
appSettings.signupDisabled: New user registration is currently disabled.

auditLogs.title: Audit Logs
auditLogs.description: View a log of all significant actions performed by users and the system.
auditLogs.searchPlaceholder: Search by action or table name
auditLogs.noDetailsAvailable: No details available for this log entry.

subscriptionManagement.title: Subscriptions
subscriptionManagement.description: Managing user subscriptions and customizing plans
subscriptionManagement.confirm_permanent_delete_body: This action cannot be undone. All project data, including materials, labor, equipment, and additional costs, will be permanently removed. Are you absolutely sure?
